review_title: One of the better work cultures
pros: The work culture at Linde is very good. There is very little politicking, and inter-departmental coordination is efficient and effective. Because of the relatively leaner structure of the organization, getting enough visibility and thus recognition is easier than other organizations where it is difficult to break through the clutter. This is also helped by the fact that the hierarchy is very flat; so there are essentially no glass ceilings.
cons: The industrial gases is a slow growing industry at best. In most developed countries, this is a stagnant or declining industry, thereby limiting opportunities in career advancement and growth.
